list.li1: Open your SMS sent to you by your doctor or GP practice containing your fit note.
list.li2: Click on the link within your SMS from your doctor or GP practice.

li3.main: Download your fit note onto your device
li3.sub: for more information on how to download your fit note, please look at your device manual.

li4.sub: your fit note may be saved in your device's Downloads, Recents or Saved As folder.

text: Your file will automatically be checked to make sure the quality is good enough

insetText.li1: the selected file must be a JPG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
insetText.li2: the selected file must be smaller than 10MB
insetText.li3: ensure all 4 corners of the fit note are included

missing: You must select a file to continue
invalid: The selected file must be a JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
failed-ocr: The selected file must be clear and readable, containing the whole fit note
tooBig: The selected file must be smaller than 10MB
